abstract.para: The topic covers how to solve access issues caused by &selnx; denials.

topic.para: In the &selnx; page, you can view access denials message from the audit log. On top of that, &cokpit; provides possible ways how to solve the access denial. &cokpit; provides possible ways how to solve the access denial. To do so, follow the steps:

step.para: In the &selnx; access control errors expand the details regarding the access denial
To view the audit log record, click Audit log
To view possible solutions, click Solutions. Some of the solutions may be applied directly through &cockpit; by clicking Apply this solution.
